name: Space Invasion (andresnavag93)
description:
This is my 2D Shooter Project called Space Invasion

Modifications:

  1. New menus design
  2. Custom levels worlds
  3. Increased player speed to move faster.
  4. Different background sounds for Main Menu and levels

Instructions:

  • Move: a,w,s,d
  • Pause Game: Esc
  • Shoot: Left click mouse
  • Aim: mouse

Credits:

Created by Andres Navarro
